metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl Ingredients:

subsection_analysis.refined_text: carrots o 1/4 cup raisins o 1/4 cup parsley o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon salt. o toss well and serve chilled.
1 cup cottage cheese, 1/4 cup diced cucumber, 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved. salt and pepper to taste. salt and pepper to taste...
tortillas are 1 whole wheat tortilla. 1/2 cup shredded cheese, 1/4 cup bell pepper, sliced. 1/4 cup zucchini, sliced. red onion, sliced.
pork shoulder weighed 2 pounds pork shoulder. pork shoulder weighs 2 pounds pork shoulder. pork shoulder weighs 2 pounds pork shoulder. smoked paprika, salt and pepper to taste.
